title: Build vs. Buy: Compare Your Kubernetes Platform Options
author: Abhinav Dubey
description: Weigh the pros and cons of building a Kubernetes platform verses buying a prebuilt vendor solution, and then decide which is best for your business.
cntitle: 构建 vs. 购买：比较您的 Kubernetes 平台选项
cndescription: 权衡构建 Kubernetes 平台和购买预构建厂商解决方案的利弊，然后决定哪种最适合您的业务。
